flawed_nl_solution:
Since Jack was faster than Jill, his total running time must have been 32 - 7 = <<32-7=52>>52 seconds.
Subtracting the the time he spent running up the first half of the hill shows that it took 52 - 19 = <<52-19=33>>33 seconds to run up the second half of the hill.
#### 33

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 52. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
